transArray.content: I like the Orange brand very much. It is very good in terms of service and hygiene. Fruit drinks are given when you check in the hotel, and the breakfast time is also very long. In short, it is very good and I am very satisfied!

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The products and services provided by the hotel are of reliable quality. We always put hygiene first, and we are constantly moving forward to provide guests with a safe and comfortable stay. Target. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and small pastries to satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel's attentive service, a cup Hot tea will make you feel at home. The room you are staying in has a cleaning lady who is most worthy of your trust and provides attentive butler-like service. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
